# delegate

**Instance Property**

The object that acts as the delegate of the collection view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UICollectionViewDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewDelegate] protocol. The delegate object is responsible for managing selection behavior and interactions with individual items.

## Managing collection view interactions

- **UICollectionViewDelegate**: The methods adopted by the object you use to manage user interactions with items in a collection view.
